PROFILE  
I am an accomplished Electrical engineer with 4 years of experience as a Project Engineer 
(Electrical  operat ion and maintenance Project). I have  proven success in organizing; planning 
and executing electrical maintenance task in given tim e frame.  I am searching for an 
opportunity  where my experience and skills would be put in use.  
OBJECTIVE  
Applying 4 years of Electrical operation and maintenance experience in a reputed organization 
where a culture of freedom and working for initiatives is ensured, facilitating my contribution 
and skills through thoughts and action to the company's target and fulfillment of the 
organization's goal, as well as self development by playing a significant role in building the 
organization's vision.

Anil Paudel  Page 2 of 2 Responsibilities  and Role details:  
 
 Conduct Operation and maintenance of all generators, Auto Mains Failure (AMF) panels, 
Electrical  Panels, Sub Panels, Underground (XLPE, PILC) and overhead cables and so on.  
 Maintaining periodical maintenance schedules of Electrical equipment’s  like a circuit 
breaker,  transformer, generators, motors etc. and execut ing them.  
 Conduct and maintain safe work place to minimize accidents and avoid surprises.  
 Preparation of the monthly work progress report, salary sheet for the entire team and 
maintain  logbook of the work process.  
 
Electrical Engineer , Rolpa Cement Pvt. Ltd (2013 -2014 ) 
Rolpa Cement Pvt. Ltd is the 500 TPD  Cement plant located in Rolpa, Nepal  
  
Responsibilities  and Role details:  
 
 Installation & maintenance of Electrical equipment's (Circuit Breakers, OLR, Contractors, 3 
phase  Induction motors).  
 Design of Electrical panel board for Distribution system medium voltage (400V) and low 
voltage  (220V), and also lightening design.  
 Motor control circuit design for 3 phase Induction motor.  
 Operation and maintenance of DIESEL GENERATOR of 1700*2 KV A 
 Record keeping and managing MIS report.
